frontmatter.title: Hey Blue
frontmatter.excerpt: Tiny portrait of Myah Graham, painted with watercolor on hot press paper.

markdownRemark.html:
Tiny portrait of Myah Graham inspired by a photograph on Sktchy. Painted with watercolor on hot press paper.

Final painting measures 2.5″ x 1.5″. Facial features at this size sure are difficult to pull off accurately. I constantly found myself getting the proportions wrong and painting them too large.

Tools used:

  • Holbein Artists’ Water Color
  • Arttec 165 Red Sable Brush, Size 00
